item.description: The city is shocked when a normal, everyday military exhibition of a new weapon technology erupts in disaster! Good think they invited the local superhero team to watch, huh? ICONS is a superhero RPG based off the Fate engine. This is a one-shot demo for 5 players, but people are welcome to come and observe if they want to learn the system. Characters will be generated at the game, but please bring your own cape.
item.name: ICONS - Fate-based superhero RPG
